import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import'./GameContent.css';import coin from'../../assets/img/play-page/coin.png';import{useSelector,useDispatch}from'react-redux';import{fetchData}from'../../utils/api';import{setGameData,showRandomNameCorrect,playSoundGameOver,showGameOver,incrementScore,updateGameLevel,setTimerInterval,resetCountdownTime,resetTimeRemainder,showCountdownTime,pauseCountdownTime,incrementNumberCorrect,resetNumberCorrect}from'../../store/gameSlice';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const GameContent=()=>{const dispatch=useDispatch();const initTimeRemainder=100;const timeRemainder=useSelector(state=>state.game.gameTime.timeRemainder);const timeStep=useSelector(state=>state.game.gameTime.timeStep);const numberCorrect=useSelector(state=>state.game.numberCorrect);const numberCorrectDisplay=useSelector(state=>state.game.numberCorrectDisplay);const showGameContent=useSelector(state=>state.game.showGameContent);const nameCorrectIndex=useSelector(state=>state.game.nameCorrectIndex);const requiredNumberProducts=useSelector(state=>state.game.requiredNumberProducts);const randomNameCorrect=useSelector(state=>state.game.randomNameCorrect);const score=useSelector(state=>state.game.currentScore);const gameLevel=useSelector(state=>state.game.currentLevel);const gameTime=useSelector(state=>state.game.gameTime);const[characters,setCharacters]=useState([]);const[products,setProducts]=useState([]);// Load Json
useEffect(()=>{if(showGameContent){fetchData(process.env.PUBLIC_URL+'/data.json').then(data=>{const processedData={products:data.products.map(product=>({...product,url:data.productsAssetsPath+product.url})),characters:data.characters.map(character=>({...character,url:data.charactersAssetsPath+character.url,activeUrl:data.charactersAssetsPath+character.activeUrl})),levels:data.levels||[]};dispatch(setGameData(processedData));setCharacters(processedData.characters);setProducts(processedData.products);dispatch(showRandomNameCorrect());}).catch(error=>{console.error('Error fetching data:',error);});}},[showGameContent,dispatch]);useEffect(()=>{if(showGameContent){dispatch(showRandomNameCorrect());}},[showGameContent,dispatch]);// Tương tác với product-card
useEffect(()=>{const getAnswer=()=>{document.querySelectorAll('.product-card').forEach(card=>{card.addEventListener('click',event=>{const productCard=event.currentTarget;const requireProduct=cleanString(document.querySelector('.name-correct-desc').innerText.toLowerCase());// toLowerCase giúp so sánh
const productTitle=cleanString(productCard.querySelector('.product-card-name').innerText.toLowerCase());// ko phân biệt chữ hoa chữ thường
if(productTitle===requireProduct){handleCorrectAnswer(productCard);}else{handleIncorrectAnswer();}});});};// Loại những kí tự đặc biệt
const cleanString=str=>{return str.replace(/[^a-z0-9]/gi,'').trim();};if(products.length>0){getAnswer();}},[products]);const handleCorrectAnswer=productCard=>{const numberCorrectElement=productCard.querySelector('.number-correct span:last-child');const newValue=Number(numberCorrectElement.innerText)+1;numberCorrectElement.innerText=newValue;productCard.querySelector('.number-correct').style.display="flex";dispatch(incrementNumberCorrect());if(newValue>requiredNumberProducts){console.log('Bạn đã chọn quá số lượng!');dispatch(pauseCountdownTime());dispatch(showGameOver());}else if(newValue===requiredNumberProducts){console.log('Bạn đã chọn đúng');setTimeout(()=>{dispatch(updateGameLevel());dispatch(incrementScore());resetAnswer();},300);}};const handleIncorrectAnswer=()=>{console.log('Bạn đã chọn sai!');dispatch(pauseCountdownTime());dispatch(playSoundGameOver());dispatch(showGameOver());};/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
const resetAnswer=()=>{document.querySelectorAll('.number-correct span:last-child').forEach(span=>{span.innerText='0';});document.querySelectorAll('.name-correct-desc').forEach(desc=>{desc.innerText='';});document.querySelectorAll('.number-correct').forEach(correct=>{correct.style.display='none';});if(gameTime.timerInterval){clearInterval(gameTime.timerInterval);}dispatch(resetTimeRemainder(initTimeRemainder));dispatch(resetNumberCorrect());dispatch(showRandomNameCorrect());// Thêm dòng này
document.querySelector(".timer-range").style.width=initTimeRemainder+"%";dispatch(setTimerInterval(null));};useEffect(()=>{dispatch(resetCountdownTime());const timerInterval=setInterval(()=>{dispatch(showCountdownTime());},1000);dispatch(setTimerInterval(timerInterval));return()=>{clearInterval(timerInterval);dispatch(setTimerInterval(null));};},[dispatch,timeStep]);// Khi thời gian giảm về không thì showGameOver và phát nhạc fail
useEffect(()=>{if(timeRemainder<=0){dispatch(showGameOver());dispatch(playSoundGameOver());}},[timeRemainder,dispatch]);if(!showGameContent)return
